name: Lava Floor (aldorug)
description:
This casual game is a cartoon 2D platformer that put twist on the childhood game, The Floor is Lava!
You play as Timmy, a curious only child, who has been left home alone to only his thought and imagination.
Suddenly the floor transforms into molten lava and Timmy hops on a table in shock; guide Timmy to explore his home from a new perspective while jumping from furniture to furniture.
